summary: 2x Retextures of some clothing items. All textures 2x original.
descriptionHtml: So I decided to try my hand at retexturing clothing. I don\'t particularly use a hell of a lot of it in Skyrim, but I thought it would be nice if the NPC\'s looked a little more... menacing and pretty. This first file contains retextures for: Necromancer\'s robes and Archmage\'s robes and as an added bonus an enhanced resolution Nocturnal robe. Many more updates to come, enjoy and endorse :)
author: Dystortion
